author: Lesa Kretschmer
title: Assistive Technology Provider Makes Website More Accessible and Offers New Tool - ForidaReading.com Partners with sitecues to Make Websites More Usable for the Blind
text:
Florida Reading and Vision Technology, Inc. (FRAVTI) is proud to announce a partnership with sitecues by Ai Squared, the makers of the ZoomText family of products and Window-Eyes. This strategic partnership offers sitecues to all FRAVTI customers and also makes http://www.floridareading.com go beyond compliance with a web-based assistive technology tool. sitecues is a SaaS product that is easily integrated into existing websites, and enables the website with intuitive zoom and speech functionality. People vary greatly, but the web is currently delivered as though one size fits all. With sitecues, website owners can better serve individuals with severe low vision, age related diminished vision (boomers and seniors) and other visual and print difficulties by making their sites easier to read, hear and consume content thus making their sites more inclusive and enjoyable to visit.
Lesa Kretschmer, Founder & CEO of Florida Reading commented, “We are thrilled to add sitecues to our family of assistive technology products and services. The product is a fantastic solution for any organization seeking to reach and empower a whole new audience. Adding sitecues to floridareading.com certainly makes our website more usable for each and every visitor.”
“This terrific partnership shows how corporations can offer truly equal access by making their websites easier to see, hear and use,” said David Wu, CEO of sitecues by Ai Squared.
About Florida Reading and Vision Technology, Inc.
Founded in 2000, Florida Reading & Vision Technology Inc. has grown into a thriving e-commerce business offering more than 700 products to the blind and deaf populous. Already this year, CEO Lesa Kretschmer and her team have launched several new low vision and blindness products, hosted several Train the Trainer Clinics, and has begun traveling statewide to promote sitecues.
Florida Reading & Vision Technology, Inc. (FRAVTI) is committed to offering safe and dependable products to those seeking greater independence. FRAVTI offers more than 700 products and tools that help those who are blind or visually impaired meet the needs of the broader public.
